pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller of program. This class mediates communication between the user interface and the operation of the application.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Salicki

                     throws java.io.IOException
        The method passes the file path to the database on the server to open and save to it data.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the text file where database will be save
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception when something will go wrong when save data to file

        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the text file with the database
        Throws:
